snippet: LUSTIG--Loraly J.,on January 18, 2016. Loving daughter of the late Harold and Rose Lustig. Sister of Merrily Lustig Tornatore, sister-in-law of Remy Tornatore. Funeral services will be held Friday, 9:30am at Frank E. Campbell -The Funeral Chapel, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st St. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LUSTIG--Loraly J.,on January 18, 2016. Loving daughter of the late Harold and Rose Lustig. Sister of Merrily Lustig Tornatore, sister-in-law of Remy Tornatore. Funeral services will be held Friday, 9:30am at Frank E. Campbell -The Funeral Chapel, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st St. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LUSTIG, LORALY J.
